```
FROM azul/zulu-openjdk:21-jre                                 ![1](Images/1.png)
WORKDIR /app ![2](Images/2.png)
COPY target/java-hello-world-0.0.1.jar java-hello-world.jar   ![3](Images/3.png)
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "/app/java-hello-world.jar"]      ![4](Images/4.png)
EXPOSE 8080 ![5](Images/5.png)
```
